properties.Name: PickListItem
properties.Description: The items picked from the Pick List for the associated Order Line Item.

Columns.Name: PickListId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Pick List.

Columns.Name: ItemSku
Columns.Description: The Stock Keeping Unit identifier, which is typically used for inventory-related activities.

Columns.Name: ItemQuantity
Columns.Description: The quantity of item to be picked.

Columns.Name: OrderId
Columns.Description: The unique number that identifies an Order.

Columns.Name: OrderLineNumber
Columns.Description: The number that identifies the Order Line Item.

Columns.Name: OrderItemQuantity
Columns.Description: The quantity of item ordered upon the related order - order line item.
